## Introduction

- The objective of the Data Science capsone project is to develop an application that
predicts the next word a user will type into a mobile device
    - [Capstone Project Introduction](http://simplystatistics.org/2014/08/19/swiftkey-and-johns-hopkins-partner-for-data-science-specialization-capstone/)</br></br>
  
-  The purpose of this presentation is to discuss the following topics:
    - Summarize the statistics of the capstone project text data sets
    - Describe unsual characteristics of this data
